description: software not launching in ubuntu
We have been using OpenLP in our Church for many years now. It's a fantastic programme, very versatile and very reliable.
Never would load up....

Open a terminal app and type this: 
sudo apt install vlc
.. but only trouble this year. Do something guys! :(
Installed the app but it is not running on my computer.
I hit Report on Victor but didn't mean it
won't launch in Kubuntu
Would love to try but can't.
It won't launch.

If you can't get this to launch, it is probably due to a missing dependency! You need to install python3-distutils and then everything will work properly (Just run "sudo apt install python3-distutils" in a terminal.)

I've been using OpenLP for about 3 years now and absolutely love it. It is certainly not perfect, but it does pretty much everything I need it to (mostly projecting song lyrics).
summary: Amazing Free Software, Launch Failure Fix

description:
I've used this application for a year and a half without a hitch in Ubuntu. I added vlc to the options so that I can stream vlc. The application crashed and would not restart. 
After reading through the forums, it seams the issue is not hardware dependent and has not been resolved. 
I quickly moved to Quelea but could not find the song database for OpenLP in any of the documentation. Even after switching software, all of the songs I've manually typed are lost. This is terrible.
After removing and reinstalling the software, the application still would not start. Unfortunately, until the issue is fixed OR the developer includes a restore/recovery feature, I cannot use this at my church. :-(
summary: Crashed Before Service - Will Not start - Not Acceptable

description: lovely. makes service sweet

My installation from the default installation would not start up at all. So I got the updated installation files from OpenLP's website.

Check for the latest version that starts fine. 
https://get.openlp.org/
under development
summary: I'm glad that it's included instore

description: software not launching in ubuntu 20.04
im an OpenLP user for many years but in Windows OS... it's my first time trying it in Ubuntu, and it's not launching, not opening. :(
summary: not able to open in Ubuntu 20.04

description: Versions are often specific to platforms, and it is important you know how to get the right one for your platform, whether Mac, Windows or the many flavors of Linux. I read other reviews of Ubuntu 20.04 and tried it for myself using the downloader from the software page and it installed without problems, but I noticed it was version 2.4 - I tried the repositories from OPENLP, however the "apt" options fail to discover the source. I also manually installed a newer version 2.93 and experienced similar issues. For now - I am happy with 2.4 and the remote capabilities and standard features available. Thank you for making this software so accessible across platforms and devices!
summary: Absolutely worth the trouble if you can get it working!

description:
I have tryed to use the app since Ubuntu 12.04 and it never worked.
over the years i have gotten new computers and still not to get it to work..
i have had dual core/quad thread system, quad core/quad thread, system, to my six core/12 thread system.. i dont understand why this continues to be in the this Distro's Repos. Sorry but i am try my best to not talk bad aboutm it

Like others experienced, it wouldn't launch for me on Ubuntu. However, I discovered that I had two versions of VLC installed. Since OpenLP is integrated with VLC, this was a problem.

I removed both, then reinstalled OpenLP and it worked as expected. I hope this helps others.
Does not open, says "OpenLP crashed unexpectedly". Ubuntu 22.04.1 ARM

I installed Openlp via the terminal with after adding the repository as recommended but the application kept crashing each time I open it. I reinstalled severally and that didn't work either.

This time around I downloaded the latest Openlp 3.0 version from https://get.openlp.org/2.9.4/ and the gave the .deb package and executable permission. And the on the terminal and run

$ sudo apt-get install ./openlp_2.9.4-1_all.deb

That was it. zozyk4@gmail.com
summary: solution, software not loading in ubuntu

description: The application don't open in Ubuntu.
wir brauchen das programm auf mehrenen PCs

Nach einer Neuinstallation auf Kubuntu ließ sich OpenLP nicht mehr starten was mich nervte da das Program sehr gut ist. Lösung gefunden: Erst python3-distutils installieren dann OpenLP dann läuft alles korreckt

He intentado abrirla varias veces pero es imposible. Se queda en proceso de carga o simplemente no ejecuta. 
La des-instale, volví a instalar e incluso eliminando registros pero aún así no funciona.
en Ubuntu 18.04 o superior hay que instalar la siguiente dependencia: python3-distutils
summary: Solucion para problema de no arranque

description: Como dicen hay que instalar python3-distutils

si no quiere arrancar después de instalar entonces:
sudo apt install python3-distutils
me funciono

A los que no se les ejecuta abran la terminal y ejecuten:
sudo apt-get install python3-distutils
